title.jp: Ore no Imouto ga Futatabi Kaettekuru Wake ga Nai

synopsis: Kyosuke is concerned that bringing Kirino back from America has caused her to reverted back to her old ways.

title.jp: Shinjite Okuridashita Onii-san ga Keitai Bishoujo Game ni Dohamari Shite Sekuhara Shite Kuru You ni Naru Wake ga Nai

synopsis: Ayase has turned to Kyousuke in help pulling Ayase from her new game. Unexpectedly, it is Kyousuke who takes the game to far.

title.jp: Ore no Tomodachi ga Megame wo Hazusu Wake ga Nai

synopsis: This is the story of Makishima Saori and Saori Bajenna.

title.jp: Ore no Imouto no Rival ga Rainichi Suru Wake ga Nai

synopsis: Kirino wants her former roommate, Ria, to homestay with her while she is in Japan. Kyousuke can’t understand why she is determined for her former rival to say with her.

title.jp: Ore ga Imouto no Kareshi na Wake ga Naishi, Ore no Imouto ni Kareshi ga Iru Wake ga Nai

synopsis: Kirino is being scouted by a model agent to work abroad, in a panic she gave the excuse of having a boyfriend for her reason of not wanting to leave Japan. She now needs Kyosuke help in order the keep the lie going but things start going too far…

title.jp: Ore no Imouto ga Ie ni Kareshi o Tsuretekuru Wake ga Nai

synopsis: While attending comiket, the group coincidentally happens on Mikagami, who turns out to be a fashion model and designer that Kirino knew from work. As the two of them start enjoying a friendly otaku conversation, Kyousuke wonders about their relationship.

title.jp: Ore ga Kouhai to Koibito Doushi ni Naru Wake ga Nai

synopsis: Unable to give Kuroneko an answer when she tells him she has feelings for him, Kyousuke asks for a day to think it over. On the way home from the Comiket closing party, Kyousuke stands in front of Kuroneko and gives his answer…

title.jp: Ore ga Kouhai to Hitonatsu no Omoide o Tsukuru Wake ga Nai

synopsis: Kyousuke was elated to be going out with Kuroneko. And Kuroneko felt the same way. The pair enjoyed being a couple, though dating was new to both of them. On one such date, Kuroneko suddenly pulls out a notebook. In it is written...

title.jp: Ore no Imouto ga Konna ni Kawaii Wake ga Nai!

synopsis: After the fireworks show, Kyousuke is unable to reach Kuroneko. He goes to school where he learns that Kuroneko has transferred to another school. That night, unable to accept this reality, a dejected Kyousuke offers Kirino some life counseling.

title.jp: Ore no Imouto ga Wedding Dress wo Kiru Wake ga Nai

synopsis: Learning that Kyousuke and Kuroneko are dating, Ayase questions Kyousuke about it. A few days later, Ayase gets a call from Manami and is told that Kyousuke and Kuroneko broke up. Convinced that the breakup was her fault, Ayase calls Kyousuke, and then…

title.jp: Hitorigurashi no Aniki no Heya ni Imouto-tachi ga Oshikakeru Wake ga Nai

synopsis: Kyosuke’s mother, Yoshino, is highly suspicious of the relationship between Kyosuke and Kirino. Their father, Daisuke, orders Kyousuke to live on his own and focus on his studies until he gets an A on his next mock college entrance exam.

title.jp: Maji Tenshisugiru Ayase-tan ga Hitorigurashi no Orenchi ni Kourin Suru Wake ga Nai

synopsis: At Manami's suggestion, everyone is invited to Kyousuke's new apartment for a moving-in party. All of Kyousuke's usual friends are gathering at his new place on the day of the party when Kirino arrives and she's forced to confront Manami…

title.jp: Atashi ga Aitsu ni Koi nante Suru Wake Nai

synopsis: Going back 8 years ago...When Kyousuke comes home, Kirino comes running to him in tears. When she holds out a broken doll between her hands, Kyousuke gives her a confident smile and starts fixing the doll. Kirino watches with anxiety, but he easily fixes.
